text: Joah Tucker is an American professional basketball player who last played for the Milwaukee Blast of the American Basketball Association. He played for the NCAA Division I Milwaukee Panthers between 2004-2006 where he was member of the team that made the Sweet Sixteen for the first time in school history. He was also previously a member of the Harlem Globetrotters. ==References== *ESPN Profile *Basketball Doudiz Profile * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in France Category:Basketball players from Wisconsin Category:Bradley Braves men's basketball players Category:Harlem Globetrotters players Category:Limoges CSP players Category:Milwaukee Panthers men's basketball players Category:Power forwards (basketball) Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Milwaukee Category:STB Le Havre players Category:American men's basketball players
title: Joah Tucker
